text: Phase #1: Build » Scan the outer relation and populate a hash table using the hash function h, on the join attributes. Phase #2: Probe — Scan the inner relation and use h, on each tuple to jump to a location in the hash table and find a matching tuple. == CMU-DB " | 22 —s ms es e e e e e E E E E — - ä — - ——“ —— |4 b PI o) 42:02/1:11:34 - BASIC HASH JOIN ALGORITHM > ‘ T!! * , El | E]
